SchoolAdmin.Title: School Administrators
SchoolAdmin.ContentHTML:
Selling tickets to your school events has never been easier. Register with PrepTickets, list your events and improve revenue accountability by accepting credit card purchases 24x7.

All PrepTickets services are provided at no cost to your school.

Learn more about our Skool Aid program

Testimonial.Title: Testimonials
Testimonial.Content: Before prepTickets, I would have to spend up to 6 hrs a month doing ticket administration tasks. I’ve found a better way now, thanks prepTickets!
Testimonial.Author: Frank S. Johns

Bottom.PropertyOfHTML: PrepTickets™ is property of Horizon Productions

Store.Title: School

Search.Headline: Search all your school's events today!
Search.Hint: Search by school name, city, or ZIP code

Column1.Title: Fast Ticketing
Column1.Content: Tired of standing in long lines to purchase tickets? Use PrepTickets to purchase online and get in events faster. Our service conveniently allows you to purchase tickets 24x7 with any internet connected device.  You can print paper tickets or easily distribute eTickets to any Smartphone.

Column2.Title: Social Sharing
Column2.Content: Now you can be connected to your school events like never before. Notify your friends, receive event updates or buy and share tickets.  PrepTickets makes it easy to share with your social networks by directly connecting you to Facebook, Twitter and more.

Column3.Title: Easy Payment
Column3.Content: PrepTickets accepts most major credit and debit cards for all purchases. PrepTickets uses a secure payment processing service provided by Authorize.net. This service provides the infrastructure and security necessary for fast, reliable and secure transmission of your payments.
